responsibilities: Perform cutting-edge research in collaboration with other researchers, engineers, and product groups.
Contribute to research breakthroughs in the field of Generative AI and Large Language Models.
Develop, improve, and explore the capabilities of Generative AI models.
Provide practical solutions to real-world problems through research.

Engage in projects related to reasoning and inference-time compute strategies, action models for automating tasks, learning and memory for agentic AI systems, orchestration and multi-agent systems, and evaluation and understanding of model and agent capabilities.
qualifications: Ability to collaborate and communicate effectively as part of a multi-disciplinary team.
Demonstrable ability to define an ambitious, original research agenda.
Keen interest in real-world applications and impact.
Experience in publishing academic papers as a lead author or essential contributor in the field of Artificial Intelligence.
Experience participating in top conferences in relevant research domains.
analysis: The job responsibilities explicitly mention contributing to research breakthroughs in the field of Generative AI and Large Language Models. Additionally, the responsibilities include developing, improving, and exploring the capabilities of Generative AI models. This clearly indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models. The skills required, such as experience in publishing academic papers in the field of Artificial Intelligence and participating in top conferences, further support the focus on advanced AI research, which is consistent with working on GenAI and LLMs.
